TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWithPrimaryInternalLoadBalancer

Docs.summary: The stage of a virtual machine scale set definition allowing to specify an internal load balancer for the primary network interface of the virtual machines in the scale set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Compute.Fluent.VirtualMachineScaleSet.Definition.IWithInternalLoadBalancerBackendOrNatPool WithExistingPrimaryInternalLoadBalancer(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.ILoadBalancer loadBalancer) cil managed

Docs.summary: Specifies the internal load balancer whose backends and/or NAT pools can be assigned to the primary network interface of the virtual machines in the scale set. By default all the backends and inbound NAT pools of the load balancer will be associated with the primary network interface of the virtual machines in the scale set, unless subset of them is selected in the next stages.
Docs.return: The next stage of the definition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Compute.Fluent.VirtualMachineScaleSet.Definition.IWithOS WithoutPrimaryInternalLoadBalancer() cil managed

Docs.summary: Specifies that no internal load balancer should be associated with the primary network interfaces of the virtual machines in the scale set.
Docs.return: The next stage of the definition.
